articles.title: 33 TikTok-Approved Products To Recommend To Your Friends Before They See Them On Reels In Two Weeks
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Anua launched azelaic acid serum that soothes skin and reduces redness. Old Navy introduced a Vintage tee made of breathable cotton. Nyx launched Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum, a pigmented gloss that doubles as a long-lasting lip stain. Fisher-Price released a DJ table for toddlers with built-in piano keys and sounds. Dae introduced Hair Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream with a built-in brush for sleek hairstyles. Maybelline launched Superfluff Volumizing Brow Mousse for fuller brows. Medicube launched Turmeric Overnight Wrapping Peel Off Mask with vitamin C and turmeric. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder for mattifying skin and setting makeup. Gold Bond launched firming neck and chest cream. Peach Slices launched Smoothing Solution Ingrown Hair Treatment.

articles.title: 47 Alternatives To Expensive Products If You Have Michelin Star Taste But A McDonald's Budget
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article highlights several affordable alternatives to well-known, more expensive products. These include substitutes for brands like Lululemon (leggings, workout tanks, running shorts, jackets), Skims (dresses, bodysuits, loungewear), Gucci (purses, belts), Cartier (rings, bracelets), and more, spanning fashion, beauty, and home goods. These alternatives offer similar style and functionality at a fraction of the price.

articles.title: bazaar Archives
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Modern cleansers have evolved into essential skincare products, considered 'skin care zero' for setting the stage for skincare routines. Industry experts highlight their importance in maintaining healthy skin beyond just impurity removal, revolutionizing skincare.

articles.title: Harper's Bazaar Archives
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Modern cleansers are revolutionizing skincare by serving as 'skin care zero' products. These cleansers are now integral to maintaining healthy skin and setting the stage for extensive skincare routines, moving beyond simply removing impurities.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers ditch pressure washers for £25 'game changer' patio cleaner
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Amazon shoppers are replacing pressure washers with 'Wet and Forget' outdoor cleaner, a £25 alternative for cleaning patios and driveways. Amazon users are also praising the Spear and Jackson spray, which costs £15.99 for tackling tough grime on patios and driveways. Wowcher also offers an electric weed sweeper.

articles.title: What's changed with Bluehost's latest ecommerce plans? I spoke with newly appointed CEO Sachin Puri to find out
articles.author: James Capell
articles.summary: Bluehost has a new CEO, Sachin Puri, and is developing new ecommerce products. The company promises to deliver more power, features, and simplicity to its users, focusing on customer success and innovation.

articles.title: I'm not interested in the Switch 2 - but there's one game that will make me open my wallet
articles.author: Christian Guyton
articles.summary: The author expresses disappointment over the absence of a mainline Pokemon game as a launch title for the rumored Nintendo Switch 2. The lack of a Pokemon launch title is cited as a reason for not purchasing the new console on launch day. The author also criticizes the overall launch lineup of the Nintendo Switch 2.

articles.title: 5 outstanding tech reviews of the week: the light, razor-thin Samsung S25 Edge and a mindblowing soundbar debut
articles.author: Josh Russell
articles.summary: The article reviews several recently launched products. Samsung released the Galaxy S25 Edge and the S90F QD-OLED TV. Marshall debuted the Heston 120 soundbar. Microsoft launched the Surface Pro 12 tablet. De'Longhi introduced the Primadonna Aromatic coffee machine.

articles.title: Grand opening of Club Car Wash to host all day giveaways
articles.author: Breana Sinclair
articles.summary: Club Car Wash is celebrating the grand opening of its new location in Grand Junction on June 7th. As a promotional offer, new customers can purchase an Unlimited Wash membership for $10 a month for the first three months. The company also offers a limited-time discount on its highest-tier $25 MVP wash for $1.

articles.title: 25 Totally Practical Target Products
articles.author: Gabrielle Moss
articles.summary: The article showcases several new products including a Google Nest smart thermostat that allows remote temperature control, a Mad Rabbit Balm Stick which keeps tattoos fresh, a Theragun Relief messager to relieve aches and pains, and an Our Place ceramic nonstick Always pan which substitutes for multiple kitchen items.  Other products like the Bissell stick vacuum that transforms into a hand vac and a retro-looking portable Bluetooth speaker are also highlighted.

articles.title: Meghan Markle stuns in breezy beach photo as she teases new As Ever launch
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's lifestyle brand, As Ever, is preparing to launch new products this month. The brand, which previously launched in April 2025 with items like Raspberry Spread and Flower Sprinkles, is bringing back customer favorites alongside these new additions.

articles.title: Best sex toy deals (June 2025)
articles.author: Tabitha Britt
articles.summary: Le Wand and Lovers are offering deals on sex toys, including vibrators and dildos. Select Le Wand vibrators, such as the Grand Bullet and Deux, are available for under $40 as part of June promotions.

articles.title: Next's £28 summer dress that 'doesn't crease' and 'skims the body'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next is offering the Pink/Orange Midi Slip Summer Dress for £28, while New Look sells the Cream Postcard Print Midi Dress for £34.99. The Next dress is a midi-length slip dress with adjustable shoulder straps, suitable for warm weather, and New Look's dress received flattering reviews.

articles.title: 2025 Hyundai Santa Cruz review: A compact pickup that defies expectations
articles.author: Mark Phelan
articles.summary: Hyundai is offering the 2025 Santa Cruz, a sporty compact pickup with a starting price of $28,750 and $42,720 for the Limited trim. Changes for 2025 are included. It combines pickup practicality with offbeat appeal in a small, easy to park charmer.

articles.title: iQOO Z10 Lite teased: a refined design, 6000mAh battery, Snapdragon chipset, and more
articles.author: Debasish
articles.summary: iQOO is launching the iQOO Z10 Lite on June 18, featuring a refined design with a dual-camera setup and a large 6,000mAh battery. It is expected to include a Snapdragon chipset and will be priced under ₹10,000.

articles.title: Meghan Markle teases what's next after Disney day out
articles.author: TN Web Desk
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's lifestyle brand, 'As Ever,' is preparing to launch new products later this month. The brand will release both fan-favorite staples like honey and teas, alongside fresh additions. The post hints at new beginnings for the company.

articles.title: HONOR 400 5G set to launch in PH on June 17
articles.author: J.G. Amor
articles.summary: HONOR Philippines will launch the HONOR 400 5G on June 17, marketing it as an "AI phone" that animates old photos and creates video experiences from still images. The phone features AI photo enhancement and motion generation, designed to bring memories back to life.

articles.title: Nubia V70 Max: Delightful budget meal phone
articles.author: Raymond Gregory Tribdino
articles.summary: ZTE sub-brand Nubia Technology introduced the Nubia V70 Max smartphone, featuring a 6.9-inch HD+ display with a 120Hz refresh rate and a 50MP AI Triple Camera system. The device is powered by an octa-core T7200 Max processor, 6GB of RAM, and a 6,000mAh battery with 22.5W fast charging.

articles.title: 5 bare-minimum features your streaming device needs to have
articles.author: Chris Hachey
articles.summary: The article highlights the Roku Streaming Stick Plus (2025), a slim streaming stick with 4K/HDR support and voice remote. Roku's 2nd Gen Voice Remote Pro also features backlit buttons and a rechargeable battery for enhanced convenience. The article discusses features that should be standardized among all streaming devices.

articles.title: SALTZMAN: Does Nintendo Switch 2 live up to the hype?
articles.author: Marc Saltzman
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing to launch the Nintendo Switch 2. The new console has improved features while maintaining a familiar feel, but may come with a higher price tag of $629.99 and some games costing over $100.

articles.title: 36 Products You Don't Need, But Your Life Easier
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Ninja introduced the portable Crispi Air Fryer system, designed for cooking and eating in the same container. Oxo launched the compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer, capable of making cold brew in five minutes. Hawaiian Tropic released the SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 2025 review: In desperate need of a discount
articles.author: Stephen Radochia
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Motorola Edge 2025, a midrange smartphone featuring a 6.7-inch pOLED display, enhanced durability with Gorilla Glass 7i and IP69 rating, and a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chipset. The phone includes a 5,200mAh battery with 68W wired and 15W wireless charging, along with a versatile camera system and Motorola's Hello UI based on Android 15.

articles.title: Engineering the Perfect Shower Squeegee: The Story Behind dancemoon JustHang Squeegee
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: dancemoon has launched the JustHang Squeegee, its first bathroom cleaning tool, on June 3rd at a special launch price of $19.99. The product is available worldwide via dancemoon's website and Amazon. Dancemoon aims to blend minimalism with household tools.

articles.title: Arunachal: Namsai Fresh Cow Ghee Receives National Recognition Under NITI Aayog
articles.author: North East Today
articles.summary: Namsai Dairy Ltd.'s Namsai Fresh Cow Ghee, a natural dairy product from Arunachal Pradesh, has received national recognition under NITI Aayog's Aspirational Districts and Blocks Programme. The ghee, made from 'Desi' cattle and produced at the Mini Dairy Plant in Deobeel village, represents a sustainable and authentic dairy farming initiative that supports local farmers.

articles.title: Engineering the Perfect Shower Squeegee: The Story Behind dancemoon JustHang Squeegee
articles.summary: dancemoon launched the JustHang Squeegee, a bathroom cleaning tool, on June 3rd, 2025, available on dancemoon's website and Amazon for $19.99. The product features a built-in hook and minimalist design aimed at simplifying bathroom cleaning.

articles.title: Engineering the Perfect Shower Squeegee: The Story Behind dancemoon JustHang Squeegee
articles.summary: Dancemoon introduced the JustHang Squeegee, a bathroom cleaning tool, launched worldwide on June 3rd with a special price of $19.99, designed for effortless use. HIRONIC hosted its inaugural 'HIRONIC Innovation Summit 2025. Asia Edition' in Bangkok, Thailand on June 5th and showcased the clinical advancements and growing market relevance of HIRONIC's flagship export technologies, including New Doubloâ'¢, PICOHIâ'¢, and the latest needle-free delivery system Synerjet PROâ'¢.

articles.title: Saturday Morning Garden Blogging - Vol. 21.23 - Is it truly mundane?
articles.author: CWalter
articles.summary: Stark Brother's is having an end of season sale on trees, offering a money-back guarantee. A standard Fantasia nectarine and a semi-dwarf Suncrest peach tree were purchased at low prices during the sale. However, the sale nectarine is now out of stock.

articles.title: Goldstein Patent Law Publishes Insights on How to Patent an Idea
articles.author: Goldstein Patent Law
articles.summary: Goldstein Patent Law has recently published an article providing insights on how to patent an idea. The article answers the question, 'Can a concept be patented?' and aims to demystify IP rights. It details how individuals can determine if their idea meets the criteria for a patent and the steps creators should take in the patent process to protect their ideas.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Lava officially announced the Lava Bold N1 smartphone on June 4, 2025. This budget smartphone features a Li-Ion 5000 mAh battery with 10W wired charging, a 6.75-inch IPS LCD display, a 13-megapixel main camera, and runs on Android 14 (Go edition).

articles.title: 32 Products With Before-And-After Photos That'll Inspire You To Get Your Life Together
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The content showcases a range of newly available cleaning and personal care products. It includes products like Hard as Hoof nourishing cream, mold and mildew stain remover, foot file, Pink Stuff cleaning product, dermaplaning razors, bottle-cleaning tablets, O'Keeffe's cream, cleaning erasers, Maybelline's Dark Circles Treatment Concealer, power drill scrubber kit, descaling solution, L'Oréal repairing hair treatment, cleaning tablets, anti-dandruff shampoo, oven scrub, drawer dividers, Essence mascara, velvet hangers, oil-absorbing sheets, tongue cleaner, jetted tub cleaner, glass cleaner, grout ink pen, cleaning kit, gas range cleaning spray, stain remover gel, cleaning wipes, hair mask, toilet wand, jewelry-cleaning stick, food container lid organizer, and broom. These products are intended to improve cleaning and personal care routines.

articles.title: What Is MicroSD Express? Everything You Need To Know
articles.author: Brad Bourque
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Switch 2, which requires new MicroSD Express cards due to incompatibility with older SD cards. The MicroSD Express standard, introduced in late 2023, offers write speeds in the hundreds of megabytes, previously utilized in high-end digital cameras. However, these cards are currently scarce and carry a price premium.

articles.title: China may open household appliance plant in Azerbaijan
articles.author: Maria Petrova
articles.summary: Youkai company, a Chinese manufacturer of household cleaning products, is considering building a factory in Azerbaijan. The company aims to supply laundry detergents, kitchen cleaners, and floor cleaning products to the Azerbaijani market. Youkai emphasizes research and development and innovation in its product line.

articles.title: Goat milk offers clean proposition for Artesia family
articles.author: Michael Smith
articles.summary: DSB Soap Company, founded in 2021 by Rachael Joy, produces handmade soaps and other body care products using milk from her 50 goats. The company sells its products online via dsbsoapco.com and at trade shows, and is considering expanding its online market presence.

articles.title: Shoppers go wild for ‘amazing' new ice cream available in supermarkets that's a twist on a childhood favourite
articles.author: Consumer Reporter
articles.summary: Angel Delight has launched ice cream sticks in collaboration with Morrisons, available in Butterscotch & Chocolate and Strawberry & Vanilla flavors. Cadbury introduced a new Twirl White Dipped flavor, while Tesco started selling Wotsits Mac 'n' Cheese Bowls. Sainsbury's also launched a S'mores Brownie.

articles.title: Next's £38 dress shoppers are buying in every colour
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next has launched a new 'Jersey Waisted Summer Dress' priced at £38. The dress is available in four colors (navy, chocolate brown, olive green, and cream) and various sizes. It features flattering waist detailing, a square neckline, and side pockets, made from a blend of TENCEL™ modal and elastane.

articles.title: Aldi selling £7.99 gadget that will keep your garden free of bugs and pests throughout summer
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: ALDI is launching the Zero In Bug Zapper Lantern for £7.99 in UK stores starting June 8th. This rechargeable, portable lantern kills flies and mosquitoes, featuring LED lights and designed for both indoor and outdoor use. It is marketed as part of ALDI's push for low-cost garden essentials.

articles.title: Enjoy Hassle-Free Beach Days With These 34 Products
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: Several new products designed for beachgoers are available. Black Girl Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 30 offers sun protection and moisturization specifically for dark skin tones. Sun Bum provides a scalp and hair mist for sun protection. Sunscreen reminder stickers indicate when it's time to reapply sunscreen. Solar Buddies offers a refillable roll-on sunscreen applicator. A beach cart simplifies carrying beach gear, and a sand-free blanket provides a comfortable seating area. A reviewer-beloved beach tent with UPF 50+ protection. Beach Pillow helps you get more comfortable while snoozing.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Launch in India on June 10; Check Expected Price, Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Edge 60 smartphone in India on June 10, 2025. The phone features Image Studio powered by moto ai, a 6.7-inch quad-curved display, PANTONE color options, and is expected to be powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 processor.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 Edge: A Future We Tested
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Edge in Sweden, a smartphone known for its ultra-thin design and innovative features. The Galaxy S25 Edge is rumored to be powered by either the Snapdragon 9 Gen 4 or the Exynos 2500 processor, depending on the region and is expected to feature a Dynamic AMOLED display.

articles.title: Top picks for Father's Day 2025 in Singapore: Best restaurants, experiences and gifts, Lifestyle News
articles.summary: Porsche Singapore offers "Teatime Dreams" at Mandarin Oriental Singapore on Father's Day weekend, featuring a special afternoon tea menu and a 30-minute Porsche drive. LeVeL33 partners with Butcher Box for a one-day-only Father's Day feast featuring a dry-aged Black Angus ribeye. Chico Loco offers Father's Day roasts with options like rotisserie chicken and BBQ pork ribs.

articles.title: Woman Finds Woolworths Wing-Tips for Sale in TikTok Video, SA in Disbelief: 'I Throw That Away'
articles.author: Rutendo Masasi
articles.summary: Woolworths in South Africa has introduced a new product: free-range chicken wing-tips sold in their own packaging. This new offering has sparked debate among customers, with some appreciating the efficient use of resources and others questioning the product's appeal. Woolworths also started selling their popular cakes as individual slices.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Flip 7 Leak Weeks Ahead Of Launch: Expected Launch Date, Specs, Price And More
articles.author: Shubham Arora
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 at its Galaxy Unpacked event on July 4, 2025. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is expected to have a wider 6.5-inch cover screen, a thinner design, and a 200MP main camera, while a more affordable Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE version is also rumored.

articles.title: Jumia Commits To Nigeria's Economic Growth, Digital Inclusion
articles.author: Olushola Bello
articles.summary: Jumia is launching its 'Enjoyment Overload' 2025 Anniversary Campaign from June 2 to June 22. The campaign features deals from brands like Nivea, Xiaomi, Itel, and others, and will include daily flash deals, brand days, games, and giveaways.

articles.title: The future is oral: How nicotine pouches are disrupting the tobacco market
articles.author: Chino S. Leyco
articles.summary: Japan Tobacco International (JTI) launched Nordic Spirit, a tobacco-free oral nicotine pouch, in the Philippines in May 2023.  The product, positioned as a smoke-free alternative, has seen a 23% month-on-month sales increase and positive consumer reception. It comes in various flavors and is available at major convenience stores and online platforms.

articles.title: 32 Useful Items That'll Make You Ask, 'What Problems?'
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: L'Oréal Paris introduces a green-tinted anti-redness BB cream designed to neutralize redness while priming and hydrating the skin. Maybelline launches a volumizing brow mousse that fills in sparse brows, fluffs up thin brows, and tames curly brows for a natural, full look.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 Launch Timeline, Price, Design, Specs, Camera, Colors And More: All Leaks So Far
articles.author: Shubham Arora
articles.summary: OnePlus is expected to launch the OnePlus Nord 5 in India by late June or early July 2025. The phone is expected to have a 6.83-inch flat OLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ processor, up to 16GB RAM, and a 6,700mAh battery with 100W fast charging support. It is expected to be priced between Rs 30,000 and Rs 35,000.

articles.title: Saturday morning lemon poppyseed pancakes recipe
articles.author: Get It Magazine
articles.summary: Instant Pot offers a lemon poppyseed pancakes recipe that uses their product to create lemon curd. The recipe suggests using the Instant Pot's pressure cook function to prepare the curd, which is then served with pancakes, whipped cream, and raspberries.

articles.title: Adv Archives
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Amazon launched a wave of epic deals aimed at tech enthusiasts and homeowners. These new promotions include various discounts designed to upgrade tech gear and revamp homes.

articles.title: 外媒：三星将在纽约发布新一代折叠屏 7月正式上市
articles.author: 手机中国
org: 三星上一次选择纽约召开新品发布会是在
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to unveil its new Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7, possibly along with a Galaxy Z Flip7 FE, at an Unpacked event in New York, rumored to be in early July. There is speculation about the possible launch of Galaxy Z Fold7 Ultra or a tri-fold device. The devices are likely to be available for purchase in July.

articles.title: How Olatunji Oluwadamilola Ifetayo transformed N1,500 to a thriving eco brand
articles.author: Chioma Onuh
articles.summary: Olatunji Oluwadamilola Ifetayo launched a cleaning agent production business from her mother's kitchen. The business is focused on eco-friendly cleaning products. The next phase of her business focuses on deeper market penetration and mass education with plans to launch campaigns that promote eco-friendly lifestyles and train rural women.

articles.title: New Gen Mahindra Bolero AI Renders Based On Latest Spy Shots
articles.summary: Mahindra is developing a new generation Bolero, speculated to be based on a monocoque platform with advancements in drive, handling, and efficiency. The new Bolero may feature design upgrades like flush door handles, large alloy wheels, and potentially an automatic gearbox, aiming for a more premium appeal. It is expected to be sold alongside the existing Bolero range with a unique suffix.

articles.title: Agentified shopping: Where AI delivers before you even ask
articles.author: www.ETBrand Equity.com
articles.summary: The article envisions a future where AI agents, exemplified by 'Pulse,' revolutionize shopping through hyper-personalization and automation. Pulse anticipates needs, suggests products like running shoes or anniversary gifts, and completes purchases seamlessly, reducing decision fatigue. This agentified shopping includes features like automatic reordering of tablets, personalized recommendations for smartwatches, and frictionless payments for sneakers, indicating a shift towards autonomous commerce.

articles.title: Clothes will be 'good as new' and stain-free with 1 product
articles.author: Ellen Jenne
articles.summary: Vanish and OxiClean, stain-removing powders containing sodium percarbonate, can be used to effectively remove stains from white clothes. The method involves soaking the stained clothes in a solution of sodium percarbonate and hot water overnight, followed by a hot wash cycle.  This process helps restore the clothes to a 'good as new' condition.

articles.title: My Switch 2 Review in Progress: It's Good, but Don't Give In to the FOMO Yet
articles.author: Scott Stein
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2, which is available from June 5th. The console costs $450 or $500 with the Mario Kart World bundle. New controllers (Pro $85, Joy-Con 2s $95) and accessories (camera $55) might be required as older ones are incompatible.

articles.title: What Is Agentic AI? Everything to Know About Artificial Intelligence Agents
articles.author: Barbara Pazur
articles.summary: Perplexity's "Buy with Pro" feature and Zoox robotaxis are examples of agentic AI. Perplexity's feature collects user preferences, processes transactions, and uses stored payment/shipping information to complete orders. Zoox robotaxis are self-driving cars that operate autonomously.

articles.title: Meet 81-Year-Old Who Sold Detergent Door-to-Door On Bicycle, Took Rs 15,000 Loan, Now Leads Rs 23,000 Crore Firm — Know His Net Worth
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
org: Geology and Mining Department of Gujarat
articles.summary: Karsanbhai Patel launched Nirma detergent powder in 1969 after taking a loan of Rs 15,000. The product was a low-cost alternative to existing detergents, priced at Rs 13 per kg, and marketed to middle-class households. Nirma expanded into soaps, beauty products, and other personal care items.

articles.title: 31 Travel Products You'll Wish You Had 10 Trips Ago
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: The article presents several new travel products designed for convenience and comfort. These include the AirFly Pro wireless transmitter enabling Bluetooth connectivity with airplane entertainment systems, a 2-in-1 straightener and curling iron for space-saving hair styling, and a Beis backpack with suitcase-like features for organized packing. There's also a 3-in-1 foldable wireless charging pad for simultaneous charging of Apple devices.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 teardown reveals Nvidia Tegra T239 chip, raises repairability concerns
articles.author: Daniel Sims
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2. Early user analysis reveals concerns about HDR results and thermal paste application. The device's repairability could be hindered by the outer screws.

articles.title: When innovation was a rocking bath
articles.author: Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Gioachino Pisetzky introduced the 'Rocking Bath,' a tilting tank designed to simulate a sea bath in homes. The company marketed this product with an emphasis on its versatility, emotional appeal, and the promise of daily luxury, selling over 50,000 units in Italy.

articles.title: Dyson banks on product innovation
articles.author: 陈子琰
articles.summary: Dyson is launching its slimmest vacuum, the PencilVac, in China, featuring a new Hyperdymium motor and conical brush. The company also designed the Dyson purifier big+quiet formaldehyde specifically for Chinese households. Furthermore, Dyson manufactures its V12 cordless vacuum locally in China.

articles.title: Preorder Pok�mon Z-A Now and Get a Free Starter Plush
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokémon Scarlet and Pokémon Violet launched approximately three years prior to the upcoming release of Pokémon Z-A.

articles.title: New Online Casinos Canada: RoboCat Launches New Games and Bonuses
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: RoboCat is reinventing itself with a new brand identity. This strategic move aims to capture Canada's new online casinos audience, suggesting a targeted service or product offering within that market.

articles.title: Is ‘Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour' Really Worth $10?
articles.author: Matt Gardner
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the 'Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour' to showcase the features of the new Nintendo Switch 2. This product introduces users to the console's sound quality, 120fps visuals, and magnetic Joy-Con 2s through minigames and tech demos, though its execution is criticized for being dull.

articles.title: Dyson banks on product innovation
articles.author: WANG ZHUOQIONG
articles.summary: Dyson is launching the new Dyson PencilVac, its slimmest vacuum, in China, featuring a Hyperdymium motor and conical brush. Dyson also designed the Dyson purifier big+quiet formaldehyde specifically for Chinese households. The company is focusing on localization and engineering in China to address the competitive market and consumer preferences.

articles.title: Google Makes New $200 Father's Day Offer To Pixel 9 Buyers
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Google introduced a new price drop promotion for its Pixel 9, marking one of its most appealing offers to date.

articles.title: Best New Features On The Nintendo Switch 2, Ranked
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo is developing Nintendo Switch 2. The design is similar to the original Nintendo Switch, but offers a familiar and new feel.

articles.title: Best Local Co-Op Nintendo Switch 2 Games
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2. Mario Kart World is the main system seller for the console.

articles.title: HONOR 400 5G set to launch in PH on June 17
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: HONOR Philippines will launch its new smartphone, the HONOR 400 5G, on June 17. The HONOR 400 5G is branded as an 'AI phone' and features artificial intelligence that animates old photos and creates video-like experiences. The launch event will be streamed live on HONOR's Facebook.

articles.title: The Internet Claims McDonald's Once Had a McLobster Roll in New England
articles.author: Tim Weisberg
articles.summary: McDonald's launched the McLobster in 1993, offering it seasonally in Canada and New England for less than $10. Reportedly pulled in 2005, the McLobster made comeback appearances as a special menu item, costing $3.99 in 1993 and $9 in 2017.
